---
title: "Country Analysis"
---

This page tracks changes in life expectancy, GDP per capita, and population over time for the United States.

```{python}
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

df = pd.read_csv("gapminder.csv")
c = df[df["country"] == "United States"].sort_values("year")

plt.figure()
plt.plot(c["year"], c["life_expectancy"], marker="o", label="Life Expectancy")
plt.plot(c["year"], c["gdp_per_capita"], marker="o", label="GDP per Capita")
plt.plot(c["year"], c["population_millions"], marker="o", label="Population (millions)")
plt.xlabel("Year")
plt.ylabel("Value")
plt.title("United States Over Time")
plt.legend()
plt.tight_layout()
plt.show()
```
